page.title: 20CREDITS: THE BROWNHILLS AREA
page.content:
The following participated in the Domesday Project for the Brownhills area:
The Shire Oak School Castlefort JMI School Millfield JMI School Ogley Hay Junior School St Bernadette's R.C. JMI School St Peter's JMI School
Thanks are due to the various staff, pupils, parents and members of the general public who were involved. Finally, I would like to acknowledge the assistance given by the Domesday Project Co-ordinators- Educational Development Centre, Walsall. Text Editor and Co-ordinator, R.H. Lloyd, The Shire Oak School (July 1985).
